website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, no-frills makeup mirror that works without any hassle.
pros: Magnification does not leave you looking distorted
cons: Swivel arm is stiff and a little difficult to move

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening this item, I was pleased with the quality. It seemed that it was of high quality and was easy to install. However, within 2 weeks of having the mirror mounted on my bathroom wall, the top part of the mount snapped right off! I have contacted the seller with hopes of obtaining a replacement item. I'm really hoping that this was just a fluke and that the items aren't all made with this horrible quality. I will update my post once I have received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this mirror so i can see the back of my head to do my own hair color. Im SO glad I did. Had to play around with placement because of purpose but it works awesome. Heavier than I expected and we didnt hang it in the drywall, which is another reason for placement.
customer_reviews.author: Lonelle Ordway

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive description of size
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it is misrepresented. The actual mirror is only 7 1/2" in diameter inside the frame; the 9.8" measurement that got me excited is to the outside of the pivot hinges which each stick out 1", and really, who cares about that. The extension is 12", not 13 1/2". So in the end, it's the same size as all the other mirrors. And the metal is not as bright and shiny as I hoped to blend with my mostly chrome fixtures. It does feel heavy and solid, so I may not bother to return it. Still need to trip to the hardware store to buy appropriate mounting hardware to support the weight.
customer_reviews.author: La Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 7x mirror
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in very good condition. Packaged well. No flaws to finish. I did notice after installing- it is slightly off on the base, so the arm is not perfectly level when I installed☹. Check that before you hang yours! I'm not redoing mine! I did install myself, instructions were a little difficult for someone who has never done this before to do, but I figured it out. Mine is in sheetrock and I used the anchors provided and it is firmly attached. I will check it occasionally to make sure it stays that way🙂. I'm VERY pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: adoresbooks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mirror lest the 1 day and it is already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this mirror!!! I have a bad back and even worse eyes, an trying to lean over my sink to put on my makeup, with no glasses on,, was a nightmare! I would always end up with makeup lines, and sore back at the same time! The installation of the mirror on the side wall was so simple, and it fold back flat to the wall so its not in anyone else's way,,, I love the magnification, for doing my eyeliner, and tweezing my eyebrows!!! I can look like a woman again, an not be afraid of scaring the villagers when I leave the house! ( no more torches an pitchforks!) LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS MIRROR!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Roache

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I installed this mirror because I have a hard time seeing effectively with my bathroom vanity mirror. It was very easy to install and came with everything you need to do so in 5 minutes. I like how you can flip the mirror over for 7X magnification. The arm extends nicely and folds back out of the way while not in use.
customer_reviews.author: robtay7

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I use this mirror for shaving and other grooming and I really like the large size. It is a solid and well constructed piece and was really easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Traczykowski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of merchandise. Large, finely ground mirror, big enough to contain the entire face and then some, has magnification on one side, regular on the other. Extends easily, swivels smoothly, mirror itself turns up and down, and swivels sideways on its base. Extends, or folds up neatly against the wall. I use this for applying makeup, extended out over the sink, because I am nearsighted, and leaning over the sink to get close to the mirror was a hassle. This eliminated that entirely, and it looks just fine, and professional, adhered to the wall at eye level. Finish is nice and subtle, I wish I'd bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday, hangers were included, easy to install. I had some specific needs, large mirror surface, not under 6”, this is 7 1/8th✔️, specific extension-13”✔️,magnification #7- (most are 10 and that’s too much for me), didn’t want to have my nose up to the glass). ✔️ Brushed nickel✔️. So far, I LOVE it. im concerned that it’s been noted it’s broken loose from the wall base, so I’ll be on the watch for this. NOTE, the diameter is given as 9 1/2 but that measurement is from outside hardware, NOTusable mirror width. Actual mirror diameter is 7 1/8th, which is a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Classy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite things! This mirror extends and tips forward or backward. One side is magnified. I moved to a new house where I just couldn't get close enough to the bathroom mirror to apply makeup or contacts. This is SO HELPFUL since my vision is pretty poor. I noticed that my husband even uses it from time to time. It could only be better if it was a lighted mirror. If you have good bathroom lighting, that wouldn't matter. We have a brushed silver finish on our mirror that is quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Lover

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: After renovating our master bath, I wanted to add a quality wall-mounted makeup mirror that flips to a magnified side. This one was the brushed nickel I needed and is very sturdy. I had our contractor install it so I cannot comment on that, but received no complaints about it. I love this mirror and would recommend it highly! I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the swivel joints are a little stiff, but I hope they will loosen with time or a little WD-40.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the DecoBros 9.8-Inch Two-Sided Swivel Wall Mount Mirror with 7x Magnification, 13.5-Inch Extension, Nickel. I was skeptical when ordering but when this arrived I could see it was a high quality mirror. I had previously owned a mirror similar to this one but it did not hold up and eventually I tossed a $120.00 wall mount mirror in the trash. This DecoBros 9.8-Inch Two-Sided Swivel Wall Mount Mirror with 7x Magnification, is a breeze to install and the Nickel finish is a compliment to the rest of the decor in the bathroom
customer_reviews.author: S Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I needed! It was easy for my husband to install once we figured out the height and location I wanted the mirror in. He made sure to drill directly into the stud so it is very sturdy and easy to use. I compared it to many other mirrors and I'm happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Big mirror with startling magnification
customer_reviews.text: Mom had one of these for as long as I can remember. It was great for shaving and close-up needs and I still find it useful. The magnification is almost shocking though it's very nice to have. Let's say that at my age, it was startling to see my face magnified seven times. I thought I was seeing the moon! It's very easy to install and needs only a small amount of wall space.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon G

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent wall-mounted mirror.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wall-mounted mirror. It has a very smooth action pulling the mirror back and forth into position. The flip from standard to 7x is a bit stiff, but better that than loose, I'm guessing it will loosen up a bit over time. I agree with other posters: Mounting to drywalls with the provided mollies is probably not going to give you the needed stability. There are BIG mollies that screw into the drywall that will give you a better mount. You could also use a butterfly type very easily with this particular mounting plate... there is plenty of room. In fact, that would be my preferred fastener if I couldn't get it into a stud.
customer_reviews.author: Meryl Logue

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: everything seemed great for a few months but then the hinges started to loosen up and sag. I tried to figure out how to tighten it up but I can't see how to do it. Update!! It just broke in 2 pieces at one of those loose hinges. This mirror was only a few months old. It looks nice..but is cheap junk!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband was looking for. As he gets older his eyesight is getting worse. Wanted a magnifying mirror to put in his contacts, and to see if he has any stray hairs, he might have missed when he shaves. I really like that it folds flat against the wall when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Long

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror and easy to install. Just be sure you hit a stud. Because as you manipulate the mirror. It puts quite a bit of stress of those wall anchors. And would no doubt loosen and pull out if only anchored in drywall using those little plastic anchors. And it also folds nice against the wall, keeping it out of the way when not in use. Wife liked mine, now ordered, ha, to put one in for her in our second bathroom! Her only complaint was that the magnified mirror made her wrinkles show up. Lets keep that a secret between us, ha!! I paid full price for both mirrors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, great price.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice mirror quality product. I've been waiting a long time to purchase one of these and I am glad I bought this one. Although, I wish I had bought the smaller mirror 7 in I think. This thing is a monster!. There are other makes of this type mirror on Amazon. This one was less expensive then the others but it is very high quality. I'm considering another mirror for our second bathroom. If I purchase one for that it will be from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Pala

customer_reviews.title: Too Distorted
customer_reviews.text: The concavity of this 7X mirror is so extreme the only place I envision it would be of use is in a funhouse. When you use the magnification side of this mirror, there is an area in the center about one-inch in diameter which is not too distorted to use. It does not matter if the mirror is 8 inches wide since you can only use that center inch.
customer_reviews.author: Veach G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! The metal is very sturdy feeling. It was easy to install and the mirrors are great. The magnification side is just what I wanted and does not distorted at all, up close.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Young

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This mirror mounted easily to the wall and it's easy to flip between the regular mirror and the magnifying mirror. I've been using it for a long time and it is still like new. No corrosion or anything from being in the humid bathroom environment. The hinges have worked well and show no signs of wear. Easy to maneuver mirror to just the right place to see what you want to see. I recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Operations Rick

customer_reviews.title: I can see
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a broken 5x mirror with this. The optics are much better on this one. It's also 7x, so I can see really well. It's bigger than I really needed, but that's a small matter. We mounted it on a stud. I can position it easily. It looks good, and was about 35% cheaper than similar mirrors. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Merry Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Option
customer_reviews.text: Hi have been looking for one of these mirrors for a while and decided to look on Amazon where I found several. I purchased this one because of its size and sturdiness. I am very pleased with the choice and would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made product
customer_reviews.text: This order arrived in the time expected. I'll admit that I was surprised at how large the mirror seemed in the package but once it was installed, it's exactly what I had envisioned. The brushed nickel finish matches the other finishes in the bathroom where it has been placed above the vanity.I am very satisfied with the product and with the quick turnaround time from order to receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hanson

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. It exhibits very good mounting characteristics when screwed into a wall stud or other solid surface. It demonstrates more than adequate strength and durability as well as dependable extensibility of its jointed neck, and it exhibits excellent optical properties in its dual mirrors. No regrets! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: WayneWarmack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality magnifying mirror
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wall mirror! I was impressed by the quality of the magnifying mirror. It's better than my old mirror. Also, this one is heavy. I don't recommend using the drywall anchors to hold it up, since you will be pulling the mirror out and pushing it back daily. Make sure it's screwed into a stud for a more secure mounting. I like brushed nickel and this is beautiful. It arrived fast, for which I am grateful. I really needed a magnifying makeup mirror. This is the best one I've seen and the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Corey

customer_reviews.title: Slight gap from the wall. Otherwise, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Looks and works great. My only complaint is the mounting hardware did not allow the base of the mirror to sit perfectly flush against the wall. I'd like to see it sit against the wall firmly, with no gap. The gap is maybe only about 1-3 milimeters. It's ignorable aesthetically, but as you move the mirror it doesnt give you a 100 percent rock-solid feel. Though I do believe it won't be an issue for the mirror coming loose. Possibly only perfectionists will notice this. Or it could be something others won't encounter, like I have. I use this every day and really enjoy it. It fits the function well. And for the price it's also great.
customer_reviews.author: uber_neko_zero

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Select the right placement as you need to be close enough to it for the mirror to "focus". Instillation is straight forward. Try to anchor it to a stud, as the mirror is a bit stiff to move which is good cause it holds its position well. I did not rate "suction" as this is not applicable to the mounting of mirror.
customer_reviews.author: karynlee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Excellent quality, perfect magnification. This is similar to (and in some case better) than many of the hotel mirrors I've used. It has been mounted and in use daily for over a year now. My only critique is that we wanted polished nickel but all they had was brushed nickel.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cernese

customer_reviews.title: Longevity, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Installed this almost 6 months ago and still no issues at all. The mirror is sturdy and works well. Installed it on my wife's side of the bathroom near her mirror and she uses it daily when she is getting ready. Mounted it with screws and anchors, doesn't budge still going strong and looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble installing this mirror to my wall. drilled the holes inserted the plastic drywall plugs screwed the screws in and done. I like the magnification of this mirror. It is so much easier to put on my makeup now that I can actually see what Im doing.
customer_reviews.author: kelly weaver

customer_reviews.title: Installed super easy. It matches my brushed nickel faucet
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Installed super easy. It matches my brushed nickel faucet, towel bars, and accessories in my bathroom . The magnification is very good. I wish it pulled out farther than 13 1/2 inches, but that is a about the longest I can find this type of mirror pulls out. I think it is a very good price compared to other models similar to it.
customer_reviews.author: T & C

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The mirror itself (both sides) was perfect, however the swiveling arm and mount were both very poor quality. The swivel arm would not support the weight of the mirror, so it sort of "sagged" at the joint until it completely came out of the wall after only four days. Maybe we got a defective unit, but regardless it was a waste of money and we are having to purchase an alternative product to replace it (as well as something to fix the mount holes in the wall from this mirror)
customer_reviews.author: Jb Yost

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid, looks good, magnification good, fits on old mount
customer_reviews.text: I've seen reviews complaining about the magnification, but that was fine, at least on mine. I had one from DecoBros or one similar to it before on which the arm broke after a few years of use, so I was looking for one that would fit the mount that was already in the wall. This one fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christian J VanderZiel

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A nice size and very sturdy. I can't believe it's taken me so long to buy an item like this. Every bathroom should have one. The mirror is so helpful when styling my hair or when I need the magnification side. It is heavy, so I would recommend only attaching it to something sturdy--like a stud (I think over time it would pull away from drywall installation). We also lubricated the hinges so that we could extend the arms easily. Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for applying makeup since my eyes are not what they used to be as I get older. I was concerned that the magnifying side would be too big and distorted but it was not, it’s perfect. The mirror extends out far enough to comfortably apply my makeup. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Even Grandma can install it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this mirror so I could give myself a haircut. In the back even. The mirror is great. The haircut, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: lizzyanny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and function
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, folds absolutely flat against cabinet, perfect for makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: Installed this screw-on mirror in my bathroom today. It comes with the screws and anchors. It is great. Started plucking my chin hairs immediately. The 7x magnification is perfect. High quality product. Love the brushed nickel.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny's girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: We ordered just over a year ago waited to make review because many products work great at first this still works GREAT. Nice finish that still looks new. Screw mounted this so can't comment of its' suction.
customer_reviews.author: JJdeadhead

customer_reviews.title: As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Solid mirror, sturdy and easy to install. Put it up in minutes. Works well. Looks exactly like photo. Was larger than I thought so make sure you actually check the measurement dimensions listed in the description and don’t just assume how it will look in your space.
customer_reviews.author: SummerSky

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: After ordinary use the joint in the arm begins to bend making it difficult to move and fold. I liked the mirror while it lasted but now have to replace with something else. I can't recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for the price paid. Comes well packaged, with good instructions, and is easy to mount. The arms swing out with an appropriate amount of resistance and everything rotates and stays in position as it should. The mirrors are of high quality, no defects or aberrations and the metal finishing is nice as well. Only one small issue is the mirror wobbles a bit on the mount, so I need to see if there's a screw to turn to tighten that up. That said, I'd buy this mirror again over any others I've seen for up to twice the price. Good value and it makes my sweetie happy!
customer_reviews.author: JoeKing

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is very easy to install. The metal frame is sturdy and elegant. I installed it for my 5' tall girlfriend who has trouble getting her face close enough to the original wall mirror behind the sink. Although I installed it for her height, I can easily use it as well at 6' tall.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hesser

customer_reviews.title: Best bathroom mirror ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this mirror. After moving I realized how dependent I was on it and got another one for the new house. My husband had this up in just a few minutes so I can’t imagine it’s hard to install.
customer_reviews.author: VLann

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works great at a good price. The pivots are a bit stiff but not an issue as some have mentioned. A little oil and some use would probably make it easier to move around but I havn't used oil and it's fine for me. I should have mounted it at face level but mounted it a little lower. This makes it hard to look up at the light above to get enough light for seeing small details, and still look into the mirror. So I use a small flashlight if I need light on an area.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend...
customer_reviews.text: With my eyes getting bad, this brings the mirror closer to me.haha It was pretty easy to install. I rated 4⭐ bc the magnifying part of the mirror isnt really helpful. Almost like a fun house effect. But with having the mirror closer to me, i really dont need the magnifying part.
customer_reviews.author: ciji11

customer_reviews.title: disappointed purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror, but the frame it sits on is crooked. It's mounted crooked on bracket. Either the bars are crooked if you mount it straight or the plate that it's attached to is crooked. It's just faulty made. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that is working well! Had to use my own plastic screw inserts to ensure the mount did not rip out of the wall. Wish that would have been included in the kit. However, mirror is very good quality and perfect to do makeup in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for cost & good close up for those at that age where they need readers.
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with this purchase as I was using one like it in the hotel on on our recent trip. I just started wearing readers, and close up makeup application had become more difficult. This makes putting on eyeliner and mascara etc super easy. It went up on the wall very easy and it swivels in many different ways as needed. Two sides to the mirror, the other side is a standard mirror so when you don't need to see every pore and wrinkle you can turn it around. :-)
customer_reviews.author: InsaneJane53

customer_reviews.title: Handy, neat &  quite useful.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this mirror. I can now see the back of my head to fix my hair properly. I can use it for close up or for the back of the head depending on what my immediate needs are. I also love the fact that it can be pushed back out of the way and look nice without being in the way in a small bathroom. Very handy indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Provides a clear up close look at your face, convenient for all users.
customer_reviews.text: After I installed this mirror, I wondered why it took me so long to buy one and install it. One side regular mirror, the other a magnifier mirror that simply works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Anderson

customer_reviews.title: great mirror
customer_reviews.text: this mirror is so handy, we love it! It takes up no counter space and is great for putting on makeup, looking at anything on the face up close. It arrved as scheduled and we had absolutley no issues with the manufacturer. I would recommend this product to anyone. I don't know why I had not purchased one of these mirrors before.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & simple install!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was very simple to install. The extension pulls out a good distance from the wall and returns to a nicely compact flat position. Flipping the mirror to magnification side is effortless. I have had it mounted for approximately 1 month and do not see any foreseeable problems. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Magnification and length
customer_reviews.text: The extension arm is not long enough from the wall to the vanity which is a standard size vanity. For me the magnification is too much - hard to get the exact angle so you can actually see to put on eye makeup. I will probably have it removed and look for another one. Should have returned it when I got it. I tried to live with it. Does not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ques in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good magnifying power a really stylish mirror
customer_reviews.text: This product has no suction power it screws to the wall it is 8 excellent product I love it very much I bought one for a friend also as a gift she loves it very much thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was easy to install. The mounting point is very sturdy. The extending folding arms hold their position. The 7x mirror is the perfect magnification for my use. The big 9+ inch diameter mirror is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: DucDuckGoose

customer_reviews.title: Had to go buy them because this mirror is very heavy (but sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars but it didn't have the metal wall mounts needed (it says so inside) to screw it into plaster/sheet rock - only concrete or wood. ? Had to go buy them because this mirror is very heavy (but sturdy and well made!) and did not stay in the sheet rock with the supplied installation kit. Once I installed it with the correct mounts it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Morris

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I noticed these while staying in many hotels. I decided to do a search for them and found this one for a great price. I love it. It’s a mirror and does what mirrors do 😐
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Mirror After Some Adjustments
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was easy to install and sufficiently study with the supplied drywall anchors. There was one problem. If I made the mounting hole perfectly vertical, the cross support arm was not horizontal. I had to separate the cross arm from the wall mount by removing two bolts and use a Dremel grinder to slightly elongate the holes. I was then able to mount the mirror so that the mounting base was at ninety degrees to the cross arm.
customer_reviews.author: JohnM

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good & Does Everything We Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to complete a recent bathroom renovation that I did. Since the new vanity placed the regular vanity mirror a distance from us, we found that for close-up work like shaving and trimming was just too hard to see. I wanted a wall-mount mirror that we could pull closer to do this type of fine work without straining our eyes. The regular mirror is great for everyday shaving and the magnifying mirror does the job we had in mind for it. Now that it's been hanging for a while in a normally damp area (what bathroom isn't?), it seems that the brushed nickel quality is good and that it will hold up well for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ebizeboy

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is great but after time it loosens in an area which can not be tightened. However, I purchased a second one because I liked my first one enough.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer T

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was able to easily install this on my wall and I'm really happy with it. It allows me to look at the back of my head while doing my hair or I can get up close to better see while plucking my eyebrows or doing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I Needed
customer_reviews.text: The 7x magnification is exactly what I was looking for. I had previously ordered a 10x magnification and it was just too much for me. This mirror is pretty and was easy to hang!
customer_reviews.author: oldhouselover

customer_reviews.title: Not only is the construction excellent quality but the frame is very attractive
customer_reviews.text: The DecoBros 8 inch mirror is fabulous! Not only is the construction excellent quality but the frame is very attractive, much more than the photo. It only took two minutes to mount the mirror on the wall with the great design and clear instructions. I can't imagine how I did without this product before! I will look for other DecoBrothers products- they are top of the line at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is ok, except for one flaw. May be a quality control issue.
customer_reviews.text: The pivoting joint between the long arm and short atm is way too loose, it can wiggle up and down several mm. The result is every time you move it, you feel like the weight of mirror will cause the extension arms to snap. Also, the bottom of mirror scratches on the long arm every time you fold it back against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it for my wife in less than 5 min. Seems sturdy and durable. She has had it for 3months now and no issues. Definitely a wiener.👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Easy to move when in use.
customer_reviews.text: The installation was very easy. I was able to do it by myself. It looks great and matches the other features in the bathroom. It is a good size so I can see all of my hair in the back. It is easy to move when I need it and moves easy back out of the way. I love this mirror!
customer_reviews.author: nanna

customer_reviews.title: Serious magnification
customer_reviews.text: It was much more substantial than I was expecting; that's a good thing The mirror is very good looking. It also it nicely in my tiny bathroom. I got it because I can no longer put on my makeup with magnification and the mirror really really magnifies! So far so great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is of exceptional quality, was easy to install and is a pleasure to use. It is secure and very steady, which a handheld mirror is not.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Corless

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT IDEA!! SUPER NICE MIRROR!!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER-NICE well constructed mirror. Wife loves it! Took about 3-5 minutes to install. Hinges are a bit tight out of the box, and would advise a drop or two of household oil or white lithium spray-lube shot into hinge joints BEFORE you hang it on wall. Work the hinge back and forth a few times to work oil into it. Easier to do with mirror not mounted to wall. I would definitely reccommend this product/buy again. Would make a great GIFT for someone!! 🎂🎅👍👍
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Attractive mirror
customer_reviews.text: the mirror's finish looks great in the nickel version. As far as the suction power I'm at a lose to explain what that is all about.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G. Koukol

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person than in the picture
customer_reviews.text: A well made product. Simple and easy to install. Well priced. A close match to existing fixtures in terms of finish and scale.
customer_reviews.author: Yabbah DaBadeux

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice shaving mirror for my bathroom, and this one is working out just fine. Easy to mount (I was able to find a wall stud to drill into) and a good size for shaving. My only concern is that the hinges are very stiff at first, making me worry that pulling the mirror out to use it could exert too much pressure on the screws mounting the mirror to the wall. No problem with the mirror screwed into the stud, but I wonder if the same would be true using anchors in drywall. The hinges seem to work more smoothly and easily over time. A good purchase, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  O

customer_reviews.title: The mirror actual size is not what the description says.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is described as having a 9.8 inch diameter. It is actually an 8 inch diameter, like most of the other similar mirrors. The vertical in-line mounting was chosen for better rigidity and solid attachment to a wall stud. The 7X magnification was another requirement. The image in the mirror is quite clear. Overall, the mirror is great to use. I would recommend it. Just don't expect the jumbo 9.8 inch size.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a replacement. If I had known ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement. If I had known the moving parts are very stiff and hard to move, I would have returned it instead of mounting it. Since it is hard to swivel, I keep it extended and hold onto the part on the wall when moving, as it is so hard to move, I'm afraid the mount is going to come out of the wall, even though my husband as reinforced it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Goldenberg

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to install but unfortunately with a very narrow depth of in-focus field
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the product except that the in- focus zone on the 7x magnifying mirror is very narrow so that when your eye is in-focus your ear is out of focus and visa versa. Installation was easy and the product is sturdy. I would appreciate the company contacting me to either remedy or replace with a lower magnification product that would have a deeper depth of in-focus field.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this mirror. Construction and materials are high quality. The arm is sturdy and extends a good length. Those that commented the magnifying side "was like a fun house" are wrong. The amount of distortion is small and the sharp area extends almost the entire width. Looks very nice on my wall and with good lighting in front of where I placed it, I don't miss the ring lighting of the other lamps in this category.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, better than I expected. Beautiful and easy to use. Installation took 2 minutes and me and my wife love it. The size of the circle was more than large enough and the magnification level was perfect to see everything you wanted. Just overall Excellent. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Needs better installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: The mirror itself is as expected. However the installation instructions were not clear at all. It took me 2 tries to get it done - only after making holes in my wall that I couldn’t use. The picture of how to install was so tiny you couldn’t tell which screws went where.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Pace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It works to see the back of your head and moves around well. As long as you arent stupid and or stubborn or impatient about installing stuff on the wall you'll have a fine time putting it up. If you can install ikea cabinets to a wall with confidence this will be no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Had a similar mirror in a high end hotel and had to get one for home. This mirror is even better! Easy to mount, folds tightly against the wall when not in use, perfect size and with the swivel arm and tilting ability, this mirror is user friendly for everyone in the family! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I used a mirror like this at a hotel and said... "I need one of those." After reading the reviews I decided to give this one a try. I am very pleased with it. It was easy to install, the stiff joints (which another reviewer did not like) help to maintain stability in any position and the quality of the metal framework is excellent. I haven't used the magnification yet, but the regular mirror is excellent. I am very pleased with my purchase. I use it daily for makeup application and blow drying my hair. I will gladly get this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Debora R. Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely packaged and was easy to install. Looks great. Will be careful/gentle with it from reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer tessen

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is very sturdy and looks very nice installed. Only took a few minutes to mount on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid bathroom mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Tremendously solid mirror!! If mounted as prescribed, it’s very sturdy. Great magnification and it works for me and my wife. I’m 5’10” she’s 5’2” and both of us find it comfortable to use. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than I thought it would. Sturdy when using the wall anchors . Good size for viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror! Needs longer screws than what came with the mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Love the mirror! Very easy to install. We did use longer screws than the ones provided, for better stability. We screwed it directly into a stud, didn’t feel comfortable just putting it on drywall.
customer_reviews.author: TBP

customer_reviews.title: Every thing it says it will be.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband. He said he loves it. Nice and big and stays where he set it at. Would recommend to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Mirror, Easy Install, Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the ease of installation, as well as the quality of this mirror. I purchased it to use while shaving, but I find my girlfriend using it often as well. It also looks great on the wall, and matches the other brushed nickle fixtures in my bathroom. I deducted one star because some of the joints wiggle, but it does not affect the performance of the product. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Farheezy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mirror for price.
customer_reviews.text: Husband installed on wall opposite bathroom mirror so I can see the back of my head. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. The 7X magnification is perfect. The product arrived on time and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Gnat

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang up. The magnification side is a little much for me so I dont use that side. I just wanted a mirror that I could move closer to my face. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: elocin

customer_reviews.title: I can see the back of my head now!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after I got a short hair cut and had to worry about the back of my hair. I remembered my grandmother had a mirror like this and on a whim looked up a mirror. This mirror is easy to install (have a drill ready). It took me 5 minutes and it was up and I now can can see to curl my hair or flip it to the magnifying side for makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I mounted it opposite the bathroom mirror so I can see the back of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm SO glad I finally bought this. I mounted it opposite the bathroom mirror so I can see the back of my hair without having to hold a mirror in one hand. I can curl and style my hair so much faster and easier now, without my arms getting tired from holding up a mirror. I will ALWAYS have one of these in my bathroom from now on. It looks great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Shula

customer_reviews.title: I love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 becasue I was hoping for polished nickel instead of satin nickel. And, because I agree the mirror is tight. However, if you position it the way you like to use it, then just swing the whole arm back (instead of folding it up) then it works great!! It's the short arm that's tight, so I don't move the short arm, just the long arm. In fact, it makes it quick and easy to use because when I pull it out, the mirror is all set for me. For the price, I'm thrilled! Yes, I would highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror, a bit smallish but it worked for my situation. Unit came with some slight bends which is why I only gave 4 stars, but we like it for the guest bath where it was used.
customer_reviews.author: PerryB

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I love my mirror!! Nothing bad. Love that I can use it to see the back of my hair! Easy to install, and stores flat to the wall out of the way!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel
